table.searchDescription: Search for a form item by key or type

form.title: Title
form.selectImageTypesHelp: Select the image types you want to accept. You can select multiple image types.
form.selectFileTypesHelp: Select the file types you want to accept. You can select multiple file types.
form.acceptedImageTypesHelp: Select the image types you want to accept. You can select multiple image types.
form.acceptedFileTypesHelp: Select the file types you want to accept. You can select multiple file types.

success.createDescription: New form item has been created successfully.
success.updateDescription: Form item has been updated successfully.
success.deleteDescription: Form item has been deleted successfully.

errors.fetchErrorDescription: An error occurred while fetching form items. Please try again later.
errors.saveErrorDescription: An error occurred while saving the form item. Please try again later.
errors.deleteErrorDescription: An error occurred while deleting the form item. Please try again later.
errors.dictionaryInUse: This dictionary item is being used in a form and cannot be deleted.
errors.validationErrorDescription: Please fill in all fields correctly.
errors.titleRequiredDescription: The title field is required and cannot be left blank.

delete.title: Delete Form Item
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this form item? This action cannot be undone.
